pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spectral Network Quantitative Trait Loci (snQTL) Analysis // A spectral framework to map quantitative trait loci (QTLs) affecting joint differential networks of gene co-Expression. Test the equivalence among multiple biological networks via spectral statistics. See reference Hu, J., Weber, J. N., Fuess, L. E., Steinel, N. C., Bolnick, D. I., Wang, M. (2025) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1012953.
